flavorText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.
name: Stonebreaker

description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
name: Destiny's Call

description: Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
name: Ground Slam

description: Stun the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: Some Solari claim the sunhawk's brilliant gleam is the bird trying to send a signal to The Immortal Fire herself.
name: Blinding Crest

description: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Spike is not a morning person..." - Malphite
name: Shaken Ground

description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."
name: Irelia

description: Swap Irelia with an ally.
flavorText: "Follow my lead!" - Irelia
name: Bladesurge

description:
Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
Create an Irelia in your deck.
flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
name: Irelia's Vanguard's Edge

description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
When allies attack, create a Bladesurge in hand.
flavorText: "...Though our hearts are heavy, we are full of purpose, and return to dance once more."
name: Irelia

description: Blade Dance 2.
flavorText: "There is no song more perfect than that of two voices entwined in harmony..." - Blossoming Blade
name: Flawless Duet

description: Play: Blade Dance 2.
flavorText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Blossoming Blade

description: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
name: Vanguard's Edge

description: When I'm Recalled, draw 1.
flavorText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk
name: Dancing Droplet

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has Ephemeral.
flavorText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
name: Shadow Apprentice

description:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"
name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

description: Obliterate me when I leave combat.
flavorText: "Keep your skills sharp--it is not only the blade that strikes, but the hand behind it." - Irelia
name: Blade

description: Swap 2 allies.
flavorText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Syncopation

description: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Lead and Follow

description: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed
name: Shadows of the Past

description: Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"
name: Ribbon Dancer

description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
name: Field Musicians

description: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter
name: Coastal Defender

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.
name: Ardent Tracker

description: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
name: Dragon Chow

description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Cataclysm

description:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
name: Golden Aegis

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard
name: Tattered Banner

description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds

description:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
name: King Jarvan III

description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
name: Towering Stonehorn

description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
name: Gallant Rider
